WorkItem.Description:
I was trying to export an Arabic document to excel using PhpExcel.. but surprisingly I cannot see a feature to set direction for a cell. When I search in forums I understand this feature is not yet implemented.

Is there any chance for this feature to be available in near future? 
Any help/suggestions are appreciated. 

Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Right To Left feature for a cell ?

Comments.Message: The worksheets can be set right to left as described in section 4.6.48 of the developer documentation
